tag_list: jeannot, muller, jeannot-muller, ciber, dhl, deutsche-post, dpdhl
overview:
Jeannot Muller actually works at Deutsche Post DHL. He is a Luxembourgian and German citizen living currently in Germany. He has a general practitioner license but moved into the IT industry in 1998. He has a PhD in medicine from the university of excellence in Heidelberg. He published a couple of papers and books in German.

Prior to DPDHL he was employed by CIBER, where he was part of the management team and responsible for project management in various IT projects for international customers. After his studies and before he was employed by CIBER, he was acting partner of a German publishing house “Gesellschaft fÃ¼r Strukturierte Information in der Medizin (GeSI mbH)” and responsible as product manager for medical information systems.
